question: You have a Facebook friend living in another country and s/he is curious to learn about a major news item in your country.Write a letter to your Facebook friend. In your letterdescribe a news story in your countryexplain why people are interested in itsay how the story personally relates to youYou do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear ...,You should write at least 150 words.
text: Hope this letter finds you well. I had enjoyed the last summer vacation with you and your family. I want to tell you important news about my community.

I read news about constructing a party club for women that in my town. I came to know about this refurbishment while I was enjoying a cup of coffee while reading a newspaper. I was so amazed due to this news. Local authorities and charity organisations are involved in constructing it.

People in my country are more interested to live in such a society where women must be treated equally. Moreover, most of the female members in my city are busy doing their domestic chores, and they don't have time to rejuvenate themselves.

I'm more eager to join this club because I feel that I could do many sports activities and exercises which will keep me healthy. I thought to let you know this because I think this news appeals to your curiosity. See you soon.
